name: opendata-oepnv
description: Scraper that re-publishes official german public transport datasets with stable URLs.
author: Julius Tens <mail@juliustens.eu>

scripts.fetch-gtfs: node -e "require('./build.js').gtfs()" > gtfs.zip && (if [ $(wc -c gtfs.zip | awk '{print $1}') -lt 100000000 ]; then (echo 'Unexpected file size, seems to small.'; exit 1;) fi;)
scripts.fetch-netex: node -e "require('./build.js').netex()" > netex.zip && (if [ $(wc -c netex.zip | awk '{print $1}') -lt 500000000 ]; then (echo 'Unexpected file size, seems to small.'; exit 1;) fi;)
scripts.fetch-zhv: node -e "require('./build.js').zhv()" > zhv.zip && (if [ $(wc -c zhv.zip | awk '{print $1}') -lt 10000000 ]; then (echo 'Unexpected file size, seems to small.'; exit 1;) fi;)
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check-deps
